title: Scroll Back to Top Icon in Shiny and Rmarkdown
text: can replace default Font Awesome chevron icon (“fas fa-chevron-”) Font Awesome icon, change color, width much (run ?use_gotop() see documentation).
code: gotop::use_gotop(   src = "fas fa-chevron-circle-up", # css class from Font Awesome   color = "tomato", # color   opacity = 0.8, # transparency   width = 30, # size   appear = 100 # number of pixels before appearance   )

title: gotop dependencies — html_dependencies_gotop
text: use_cdn boolean. TRUE use Content Delivery Network (CDN), true default, false use locally stored files.

title: Add scroll up icon — use_gotop
code: use_gotop(   src = "fas fa-chevron-up",   width = 45,   opacity = 0.5,   place = "right",   color = "",   appear = 200,   scrolltime = 800,   fadein = 500,   fadeout = 500,   marginX = 2,   marginY = 2,   container = "",   zIndex = 9,   use_cdn = TRUE )

title: Add scroll up icon — use_gotop
text: src string. CSS classes used display gotop icon. width integer. width gotop icon. opacity decimal Sets transparency level gotop icon, 1 transparent , 0.5 50 percent see-0 completely transparent. place string. location gotop icon shown. Valid values 'right' 'left'. color string. color selected gotop icon. appear integer. amount pixels page must scrolled gotop icon displayed. scrolltime integer. number determining long animation run scrolling top page. fadein integer. number determining long animation run fading opaque. fadeout integer. number determining long animation run fading transparent. marginX integer. percentage amount indicating far away gotop icon bottom, left, right, depending value place. marginY integer. percentage amount indicating far away gotop icon top bottom, depending value place. container string. HTML element scroll function attached. value given, scroll function attched window. zIndex integer. z-index value. use_cdn boolean. TRUE use Content Delivery Network (CDN), true default, false use locally stored files.
